io.github.ageofwar.telejam

Class Bot

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.ageofwar.telejam.Bot

  • public final class Bot
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing a connection to the Telegram API.

    • Method Detail

      • fromToken

        public static Bot fromToken(java.lang.String token)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Constructs and returns a Telegram Bot with a token and ensures that it is a valid bot.
        Parameters:
        token - the token used for the connection to the Telegram API
        Returns:
        the created bot
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O Exception occurs
        TelegramException - if the token is invalid

      • fromApiUrl

        public static Bot fromApiUrl(java.lang.String apiUrl,
                             java.lang.String apiFileUrl)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Constructs and returns a Telegram Bot with the API url and ensures that it is a valid bot.
        Parameters:
        apiUrl - the API url
        apiFileUrl - the API file url
        Returns:
        the created bot
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O Exception occurs
        TelegramException - if the token is invalid

      • execute

        public <T extends java.io.Serializable> T execute(TelegramMethod<T> method)
                                           throws java.io.IOException
        Invokes a method of the Telegram Bot API.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the return type of the method
        Parameters:
        method - the method to execute
        Returns:
        the result of the method invocation
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs
        TelegramException - if the method invocation returns an error
